name: Grey Cubes
description: Grey Cubes is a modern variation on the brick-breaker-type game, based on real-time physics and three-dimensional gameplay (not just 3d look).Minimalist in style, with clean graphics and deep, original soundtrack.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8 Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c and Shader Model 3.0 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Any
